text: Anata gata no omo no o yurushi o koi negae. Soshite anata gata wa, kaigo shite kare no moto ni kaere,(-sō sureba arrā wa) sadame rareta jiki made iroirona yoi mono o kyōju sa seru. Mata kōseki no ōi mono ni wa, sorezore hōfu ni megumi o atae rareru.Daga moshi, somuki sarunaraba, watashi wa anata gata no tame ni idaina-bi no chōbatsu o osoreru
